title: On the Poincare polynomials for Landau-Ginzburg Orbifolds
abstract: We construct the Poincare polynomials for Landau-Ginzburg orbifolds with projection operators.Using them we show that special types of dualities including Poincare duality are realized under certain conditions. When Calabi-Yau interpretation exists, two simple formulae for Hodge numbers $h^{2,1}$ and $h^{1,1}$ are obtained.
